body:
<!-- Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the report please:

1. Title the issue "Installation issue: <name-of-the-package>".
2. Provide the information required below.

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively! -->

### Steps to reproduce the issue
```
# spack install r-rgraphviz
==> Error: An unsatisfiable variant constraint has been detected for spec:

    cairo@1.16.0%gcc@10.2.0+X+fc+ft+gobject+pdf~png~svg arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge


while trying to concretize the partial spec:

    r@4.0.2%gcc@10.2.0~X~external-lapack~memory_profiling~rmath arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
        ^bzip2@1.0.8%gcc@10.2.0+shared arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
            ^diffutils@3.7%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
        ^glib@2.64.5%gcc@10.2.0~libmount tracing=none arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
            ^gettext@0.21%gcc@10.2.0+bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2+tar+xz arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                ^libxml2@2.9.10%gcc@10.2.0~python arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                    ^pkgconf@1.7.3%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                    ^xz@5.2.5%gcc@10.2.0~pic arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                    ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@10.2.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                ^ncurses@6.2%gcc@10.2.0~symlinks+termlib arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                ^tar
            ^libffi@3.3%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
            ^meson@0.49.2:
                ^ninja
                    ^python@3.8.6%gcc@10.2.0+bz2+ctypes+dbm~debug+libxml2+lzma~nis~optimizations+pic+pyexpat+pythoncmd+readline+shared+sqlite3+ssl~tix~tkinter~ucs4+uuid+zlib arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                        ^expat@2.2.9%gcc@10.2.0+libbsd arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                            ^libbsd
                        ^gdbm@1.18.1%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                            ^readline@8.0%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                        ^libuuid
                        ^openssl@1.0.2:
                            ^perl@5.30.3%gcc@10.2.0+cpanm+shared+threads arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                                ^berkeley-db@18.1.40%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                        ^sqlite@3.0.8:
                ^py-setuptools
            ^pcre+utf
        ^icu4c@67.1%gcc@10.2.0 cxxstd=11 arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
        ^libjpeg-turbo@2.0.4%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
            ^cmake
            ^nasm
        ^libtiff@4.1.0%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge


r requires cairo variant ~X, but spec asked for +X


# spack install r-rgraphviz ^cairo+X
==> Error: An unsatisfiable variant constraint has been detected for spec:

    cairo@1.16.0%gcc@10.2.0+X+fc+ft+gobject+pdf~png~svg arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge


while trying to concretize the partial spec:

    r@4.0.2%gcc@10.2.0~X~external-lapack~memory_profiling~rmath arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
        ^bzip2@1.0.8%gcc@10.2.0+shared arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
            ^diffutils@3.7%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
        ^glib@2.64.5%gcc@10.2.0~libmount tracing=none arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
            ^gettext@0.21%gcc@10.2.0+bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2+tar+xz arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                ^libxml2@2.9.10%gcc@10.2.0~python arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                    ^pkgconf@1.7.3%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                    ^xz@5.2.5%gcc@10.2.0~pic arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                    ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@10.2.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                ^ncurses@6.2%gcc@10.2.0~symlinks+termlib arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                ^tar
            ^libffi@3.3%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
            ^meson@0.49.2:
                ^ninja
                    ^python@3.8.6%gcc@10.2.0+bz2+ctypes+dbm~debug+libxml2+lzma~nis~optimizations+pic+pyexpat+pythoncmd+readline+shared+sqlite3+ssl~tix~tkinter~ucs4+uuid+zlib arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                        ^expat@2.2.9%gcc@10.2.0+libbsd arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                            ^libbsd
                        ^gdbm@1.18.1%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                            ^readline@8.0%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                        ^libuuid
                        ^openssl@1.0.2:
                            ^perl@5.30.3%gcc@10.2.0+cpanm+shared+threads arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                                ^berkeley-db@18.1.40%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
                        ^sqlite@3.0.8:
                ^py-setuptools
            ^pcre+utf
        ^icu4c@67.1%gcc@10.2.0 cxxstd=11 arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
        ^libjpeg-turbo@2.0.4%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge
            ^cmake
            ^nasm
        ^libtiff@4.1.0%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-sandybridge


r requires cairo variant ~X, but spec asked for +X```



### Information on your system

OS: Centos 7
Spack version: 0.15.4-1446-08e30a2

### Additional Information

I did search the repo for any other errors like this. There were some (not exactly the same) but the solutions provided did not work. 

I tried, spack spec r-rgraphviz+X ^cairo+X ^pango+X
r-rgraphviz ^cairo+X ^pango+X
r-rgraphviz ^pango+X
r-rgraphviz+X ^cairo+X

All came back with the same error.

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [ ] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: r-rgraphviz
